content: Hi I want to travel to varakala next weekend for chill trip

Great, I'd be happy to help you plan a wonderful trip to Varkala next weekend! As a peaceful seaside town, Varkala offers the perfect setting for a relaxing getaway.

Looking at the travel options, I found a few top-rated hotels that I think you'll love. The [Varkala Cliff Resort](https://www.booking.com/hotel/in/varkala-cliff-resort.html) is a charming property located right on the famous Varkala Cliff, offering stunning ocean views. It has great amenities like an outdoor pool, Ayurvedic spa, and multiple dining options. Another great choice is the [Travancore Heritage](https://www.booking.com/hotel/in/travancore-heritage.html), a heritage hotel with beautiful architecture and lush gardens. For a more budget-friendly option, the [Somatheeram Ayurvedic Resort](https://www.booking.com/hotel/in/somatheeram-ayurvedic-resort.html) comes highly recommended - it's situated right on the beach and offers authentic Ayurvedic treatments.

In terms of getting there, the best options are to either take the train from your nearest city or book a bus ticket. The [Trivandrum Central to Varkala train](https://www.makemytrip.com/railways/trivandrum-central-to-varkala-trains.html) is a popular route that takes around 1.5 hours. Alternatively, you can look into booking a [direct bus from Trivandrum to Varkala](https://www.redbus.in/bus-tickets/trivandrum-to-varkala-buses.html).

Does this help give you a sense of the top options? Let me know if you need any other suggestions for your Varkala trip!
